LineComment.Text: Set Vitual OUTput - je nach Projekt
wait for user input (activate / deactivate communication)
=> status is set to 1 (connect) and all status-values are set to default

AttributeList.Text: call FB65 (TCON) as long as status = 1 (connect) - if connection_1 is established (TCON_DONE=1) change to status=2 (send) - if an error occurs (TCON_ERR=1) change to status=5 (error)

call FB63 (TSEND) as long as status = 2 (send) - if send is complete (TSEND_DONE=1) change to status=3 (receive) - if an error occurs (TSEND_ERR=1) - if TSEND_STATUS='80A1' or '80C4' stay at status=2 and try to send again - if TSEND_STATUS<>'80A1' or '80C4' change to status=5 (error)

call FB64 (TRCV) as long as status = 3 (receive) - if new data is received (TSEND_NDR=1) change to status=2 (receive) and increment send_values - if an error occurs (TRCV_ERR=1) - if TRCV_STATUS='80A1' or '80C4' change to status=2 and try to send - if TRCV_STATUS<>'80A1' or '80C4' change to status=5 (error)
call FB66 (TDISCON) as long as status = 4 (disconnect) - if connection_1 is disconnected (TDISCON_DONE=1) change to status=0 (init) - if an error occurs (TDISCON_ERR=1) change to status=5 (error)
